SENT.plain: A case is described in which a patient with ulcerative colitis developed chronic vaginal ulceration around the incision lines after cone biopsy
The ulcers persisted at the vaginal vault after abdominal hysterectomy and removal of a cuff of vagina
Non-specific histological features compatible with pyoderma gangrenosum were found on biopsy
